When a group of hijackers led by criminal mastermind 
Ryder (John Travolta) take the passengers aboard a 
New York subway train hostage and demand a king's 
ransom, it's up to police Lt. Zachary Garber (Denzel 
Washington) to bring them down. Directed by Tony Scott 
(Man on Fire) this action thriller -- an update of the 
1974 film from Joseph Sargent -- also stars James 
Gandolfini, John Turturro, Luis GuzmÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¡n and Gbenga 
Akinnagbe.

Starring: Denzel Washington, John Travolta

Director: Tony Scott
